channel.title: [Suggestion] Template for Logs
channel.description:
Greetings!
I have but a mere simple request my almighty game devs, can there please be an option to auto-populate the right side of your log books for number 1-16 if players want to? I really hate manually typing 1-16 in every game and yes I know I could just do it once and copy it from a text pad but I have had mistakes in games where my copy and past for jail logs messed it up :frowning:

item.title: [Suggestion] Template for Logs
item.dc:creator: Krohdo
item.description:
i just have a macro set to my keyboard’s Marco key “M1” to input 1 {space} - {enter} 2 {space} etc etc. That way i just open up my will and click right page, then press it and almost instantly it just types it all out for me. I would suggest trying that in the mean time, saves a lot of time especially as prince N1 or something

Read full topic

item.title: [Suggestion] Template for Logs
item.dc:creator: livejamie
item.description:
It would be a great way to teach new players proper journaling as well.

Read full topic

item.title: [Suggestion] Template for Logs
item.dc:creator: CN73DRUMMER
item.description:
Like an option in the main menu to edit your journal template? And every game your journal starts out the way you like it and you just have to fill it out? Love that idea.

Read full topic

item.title: [Suggestion] Template for Logs

item.description:
Great sugesttion. Let us choose our own template

item.title: [Suggestion] Template for Logs
item.dc:creator: PennilessImp749
item.description:
PandaKing:

I have but a mere simple request my almighty game devs, can there please be an option to auto-populate the right side of your log books for number 1-16 if players want to? I really hate manually typing 1-16 in every game and yes I know I could just do it once and copy it from a text pad but I have had mistakes in games where my copy and past for jail logs messed it up

I would also like Template for doing Journals.
I have a notepad on desktop that im resorting to copy paste from… this shouldnt be manditory to make the game easier.

Read full topic
